Combat Overview: R60' Ally avoid AOO or foe flat-footed 4/dy
Coordinated Attack: R30' Allies attack same foe at +1/participant (max +5) 3/dy
Coordinated Initiative: R30' Allies use self initiative 3/dy
Death Attack: Sneak attack after 3 rd of study causes death or paralysis 1d6+10 rd (DC 22 Fort neg)
Directed Attack: R30' Ally add half self base attack 1/dy
Fast Hands: Trade -2 first rd attack for +4 Initiative
Improved Coup De Grace: Max damage from standard action coup de grace
Sneak Attack: Hit +6d6 HP when surprising or flanking
Stunning Sneak Attack: Sneak attack stuns foe for 1 rd 3/dy (DC 22 neg)
Target Study: DC 10+target HD Gather Information gives +2 attack, +2 damage, or +4 AC vs. target
The Drop: +4 attack and damage vs. flat-footed foe
Uncanny Dodge: Always adds Dex modifier to AC

Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
